lead_paragraph: Mr. Rahami appeared in United States District Court on Thursday to face federal charges related to the September bombings in New York and New Jersey.

byline.original: By BENJAMIN WEISER and ADAM GOLDMAN

headline.print_headline: Bombing Suspect Appears  in Court on Terror Charges
headline.main: Ahmad Rahami, Manhattan Bombing Suspect, Makes His First Court Appearance

snippet: Mr. Rahami appeared in United States District Court on Thursday to face federal charges related to the September bombings in New York and New Jersey....
abstract: Ahmad Khan Rahami, who is accused of carrying out bombing in New York City and New Jersey, makes his first in-person court appearance since his release from hospital, where he recovered from gunshot wounds sustained during shootout with New Jersey police.
